title: "How Does HIV Drug Help Protect Against Build-Up of Dementia?"
excerpt: "Scientists have also discovered HIV medication that restores this vital function. The findings are published in Neuron. A common characteristic of neurodegenerative diseases such as Huntington's disease and various forms of dementia is the build-up in the brain of clusters - known as aggregates - of misfolded proteins,"
